item.title: Storyline 360 Crash Course on animation and interactivity using GSAP & Javascript
item.description: In this video tutorial, we’ll go through a few projects that will help us understand how to implement GSAP to create complex animations, emphasis animations and enhanced interactions in Articulate Storyline 360. GSAP (Greensock Animation Platform) is a Javascript code library that is already integrated into Storyline, which makes it easier for us to animate our slide objects with code to increase interactivity and perhaps cut down on development time for our e-learning projects.
